Watch.Name: Clock
Watch.Description: Clock as int. Range is 90 down to 0.

Watch.Name: P1 Health
Watch.Description: Player 1 health as a float. Range is 1.0f to 0.0f

Watch.Name: P1 X-Ray Bar
Watch.Description: The X-Ray bar for player 1 as a float. Range 0.0f to 1.0f.

Watch.Name: P2 Health
Watch.Description: Player 2 health as a float. Range 1.0f to 0.0f.

Watch.Name: P2 X-Ray Bar
Watch.Description: The X-Ray bar for player 2 as a float. Range 0.0f to 1.0f.

Watch.Name: Main selected items
Watch.Description: Values are 0 through num_options_-1 as an int

Watch.Name: Main menu 1/2/3/4 player selection
Watch.Description: Range is 1 through 4 as an int

Watch.Name: Player 1 character selection
Watch.Description: Integer in range 0 through 32, but 27 is skipped.

Watch.Name: Player 1 Fight Menu - Game Mode
Watch.Description: Ladder, Tag Ladder etc - values are 0 through 7 as int

Watch.Name: Player 1 - In Fight Submenu
Watch.Description: Checks to ensure player 1 is in Fight submenu (matches 429 in fight submenu)

Trigger.Name: Clock trigger for InGame vs InMenu determination
Trigger.Description: Round timer. 90 down to 0 as an int

Trigger.Name: P1 Health Low
Trigger.Description: Says health low when 10% or less.

Trigger.Name: Clock 45
Trigger.Description: Says clock 45 at the halfway point of the round

Trigger.Name: Clock 10
Trigger.Description: Says clock 10 when the clock hits that value.

Trigger.Name: P1 - One Third Bar - Enhanced
Trigger.Description: Says Enhanced when you get one third bar.

Trigger.Name: P1 - Two Thirds Bar - Breaker
Trigger.Description: Says breaker when player 1 gets two thirds bar.

Trigger.Name: P1 - Full Bar - X-Ray
Trigger.Description: Says X-Ray when player 1 gets full bar.

Trigger.Name: P2 Health Low
Trigger.Description: Says health low when 10% or less.

Trigger.Name: P2 - One Third Bar - Enhanced
Trigger.Description: Says Enhanced when player 2 gets one third bar.

Trigger.Name: P2 - Two Thirds Bar - Breaker
Trigger.Description: Says breaker when player 2 gets two thirds bar.

Trigger.Name: P2 - Full Bar - X-Ray
Trigger.Description: Says X-Ray when player 2 gets full bar.

Trigger.Name: Single Player Main Menu - Story Mode
Single Player Main Menu - Challenge Tower
Single Player Main Menu - Exit Game
Character selection 25 - Seheeva
Trigger.Description: Says character name - NOTE: There is no char 24.

Trigger.Name: Character selection 28 - Cyber Sub-Zero
Trigger.Description: Says character name. Note: There is no char 27.

Trigger.Name: Player 1 Game Type - Test Your Luck
Player 1 Game Type - Test Your Might
Player 1 Game Type - Test Your Sight
Player 1 Game Type - Test Your Strike
DEPENDENT - Player 1 is in Fight submenu
Trigger.Description: Value 8 is top level menu, 13 is first submenu for P1

Trigger.Name: Player 2 - Versus Submenu options - One Vs One
DEPENDENT - Player 2 is in Versus submenu
Player 2 - Versus Submenu options - Two Vs Two
Player 2 - Versus Submenu options - Test Your Luck

GameConfig.Description:
Mortal Kombat 9 - Al Lansley 2017-10-14
This config uses sample-based output for health, clock and gauge values - as well as tolk-based output for menu sonification.
GameConfig.ConfigDirectory: Mortal Kombat Komplete Edition (Steam - Build ID 344915)\
